page.title: 09POP MUSIC IN 1985
page.content: We went into Castleford and interviewed 50 people of different ages.These were the most popular types of music:fast dancing music 22,slow dancing 13,reggae 6,robotics 6,break dancing 3.There are three record shops in Castleford. A single costs Â£1.45 and an L.P.Â£5.50. 32 people bought a single less than once a month,9 people never,8 once a month and 1 once a week. 36 people bought an L.P. less than once a month,9 once a month,4 never and 1 once a week. We also asked people who was their favourite group or singer. Paul Young was the most popular with 19,then Wham 9,and Duran Duran 8. We also asked 114 children in our school which was their favouite. The results were Wham 49,Madness 29,Frankie Goes to Hollywood 27,Duran Duran 12,Heavy Metal 9,Meat Loaf 8,B.Springsteen 6.
